message:
BREAKING: API Routes Updated (2024-12-23)

Server endpoints have been restructured: all /v1/gong/* routes are now under /v1/communications/* or /v1/briefs/*. Old app versions will return 404. Please update to the latest client before continuing.

Dec. 15, 2025 - We're Back!

Great news - all Gong search issues have been resolved! The database now contains complete data for all customers from 2020-2025. Thanks for bearing with us, and happy searching! Let me know if you run into any lingering issues. -Jared
tool_update: v2.2.5: Semantic search via embeddings for portfolio-wide discovery and cross-customer insights. Dynamic context window adjustment for intelligent response verbosity. CSS architecture overhaul, fixed streaming text duplication, currency symbols now display correctly, improved thinking block UX.
